title: Topic 006 Question 007
body: A company uses ExpressRoute to connect an on-premises datacenter to Azure. You deploy two virtual machines (VMs) named VM1 and VM2 in Azure. You configure Internet Information Services (IIS) on VM1.
Users experience the following connection issues from on-premises:
•	Unable to connect to IIS on VM1
You need to troubleshoot the issues.

Which cmdlets should you use? To answer, drag the appropriate cmdlets to the correct target VMs. Each cmdlet may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
